plot: Beth's lover never comes home, so she goes out into the Hollywood night to find him, and finds a world of loneliness, denial, and prostitution.
title: Playground Girls
plot_es: Beth's lover never comes home, so she goes out into the Hollywood night to find him, and finds a world of loneliness, denial, and prostitution.
plot_en: Beth's lover never comes home, so she goes out into the Hollywood night to find him, and finds a world of loneliness, denial, and prostitution.
